Summary: going to the store on my byke i saw at night 6 sphere shaped ufos
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around November 9th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was going to the store on my byke and stopped on a corner to look both ways before crossing the street.when I looked to the right so I could cross and when I looked I saw in the sky the first orb lit up like a giant ball of light.i sort of froze because I already knew what I was looking at. so I just stood there and to my amazement they would appear from the right and one by one they all followed one another and came lower for a very short while moving to the left of me across the sky like being pulled on a giant string like giant pearls and they all shot upwards and they went so high I knew the were not helicopters or anything from here.after that I went to the store and when I came back I stood at the same place because I saw a plane at the same spot that I saw the orbs and I could tell the diference that what I saw was not a plane . I felt nerveous at the time of the sighting and called my roommate at the time while looking at these things.
